snippet: Foxwoods’ owners announced an accord with a developer, and other groups want to build projects, but all require a change in the Constitution.
abstract: Mashantucket Pequot Indians, who own Foxwoods casino resort, announce accord with a developer to build $500 million casino-resort on 500 wooded acres in Liberty, NY; two other groups are also looking to build casino-resorts in the Catskills but all require a change to New York State Constitution, which limits casino gambling to Indian land.
lead_paragraph: Foxwoods’ owners announced an accord with a developer, and other groups want to build projects, but all require a change in the Constitution.

headline.main: New Plans for Casinos in the Catskills
headline.print_headline: New Plans for Casinos in the Catskills
